name: Buried Booty
description:
Please download the windows / linux version below:

You can play the game with just a keyboard, but a xbox controller is recommended. 

  • Left Stick - Movement
  • A - Interact
  • B - Dash
  • Start - Pause

If you have a keyboard, you can use:

  • WASD / Arrows - Movement
  • Space / Enter / Z - Interact
  • Shift / X - Dash
  • Esc / P - Pause

The game was developed over 8 days for the Jamoween 2021 Part 2 Game Jam, which was organised by the Indie Game Squad. The theme of the jam was 'Burried Alive'.
